featured.text: We were very disappointed that we couldn’t reach San Francisco.
David felt disappointed when he found out that he could not choose his study partners, but would be ______ placed in a study group.

definition.zh_def: 失望的，對某事或某人感到不滿或沮喪。
definition.en_def: Feeling sad or displeased because something has not happened or turned out as expected.
definition.example: She was disappointed when her favorite team lost the game.
